DOC.brief_summary: The investigator hypothesize genetic variant G protein influence development restenosis clinical outcome patient receive drug-eluting stent ( DES ) .
DOC.detailed_description: Although drug-eluting stent ( DES ) reduce restenosis rate compare bare-metal stent , restenosis rate still high high-risk group . G protein play important role signal transduction lead vascular smooth muscle proliferation . The initial subsequent study suggest T allele C825T polymorphism associate enhance transmembrane signal via Gi protein .
DOC.criteria: Patients underwent followup angiography . All patient must implant DES last two year . For nonISR group , patient underwent followup angiography le 6 month away stent implanting .
